metadata.name: Pub/Sub Protobuf to Bigtable streaming
metadata.description: Stream Protobuf records from Pub/Sub to Bigtable

parameters.name: inputSubscription
parameters.label: PubSub subscription name
parameters.helpText: The name of the subscription from which data is read. For example, projects/<project-id>/subscriptions/<subscription-name>

parameters.name: outputTopic
parameters.label: Dead-letter output topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic to write dead-letter records. For example, projects/<project-id>/topics/<topic-name>.

parameters.name: bigtableWriteProjectId
parameters.label: Bigtable project id
parameters.helpText: Bigtable project id to write to

parameters.name: bigtableWriteInstanceId
parameters.label: Bigtable instance id
parameters.helpText: Bigtable instance id to write to

parameters.name: bigtableWriteTableId
parameters.label: Bigtable table id
parameters.helpText: Bigtable table id to write to

parameters.name: bigtableWriteAppProfile
parameters.label: Bigtable app profile
parameters.helpText: Bigtable app profile to use for the export
